posts.post_title: T205 AB and Cycle For sale
posts.post_content:
Hello I have a pair of raw T205s for sale. Titus Green AB and Bris Lord Cycle. Price is 100 shipped for the pair. Scans can be viewed in my FS/FT folder in my signature line.

                                               Steve
Bump for price drop $100 shipped for the pair....

Titus has been sold. The Cycle Lord is left $30.00 shipped if anyone is interested.
                                   Thanks,
                                    Steve
